name: Hadoop
body:

Scripts I wrote to manage my hadoop filers.
Soon this will have a more detailed description.

### Support or Contact
If you have problems with this script, drop me a line to my email (see on my profile).
tagline: Scripts and other things related to hadoop
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
